name: 蔣勇南
objective: 本課程介紹心理學理論，並探討如何應用心理學於英語教學，以提昇學生學習動機和自我學習、自我反思能力。
schedule:
Week	Date	Topics
1		Introduction
2		Personality
3		Personality
4		S-T Conference
5		Motivation
6		Motivation
7		Motivation
8		Learning anxiety
9		Learning anxiety
10		WTC
11		Learning beliefs
12		Learning strategies
13		Learning strategies
14		Learning styles
15		Learning styles
16		Proposal presentation
17		Proposal due
18		Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Grading policy:
Teaching Demonstration 20%; Group Assignment and Presentation 20%; Individual Proposal 50%; Reflections 10%
